snippet: Teachers, city officials and parents in the country’s third-largest school system hope a contract is approved and a strike avoided.
abstract: Contract talks for Chicago teachers are expected to stretch into the weekend as hundreds of thousands of families begin grappling with the prospect of a strike by the Chicago Teachers Union.
lead_paragraph: Teachers, city officials and parents in the country’s third-largest school system hope a contract is approved and a strike avoided.

headline.seo: School Year Just Begun, Teachers Strike Looms in Chicago
headline.main: School Year Just Begun, Teachers Strike Looms in Chicago
headline.print_headline: School Year Just Begun, Union Talks In Chicago
